Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class IntegrationTestBulkLoad.LinkedListCreationMapper

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ImmutableBytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue>
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.IntegrationTestBulkLoad.LinkedListCreationMapper
Enclosing class:
IntegrationTestBulkLoad
public static class IntegrationTestBulkLoad.LinkedListCreationMapper extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ImmutableBytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue>
Mapper that creates a linked list of KeyValues. Each map task generates one linked list. All lists start on row key 0L. All lists should be CHAIN_LENGTH long.
